text: The Northern Province is one of the five administrative regions of Sierra Leone. Its area is 35,936 kmÂ² and 2,502,865 people lived here in 2015. The capital is Makeni. == Districts == The province has four districts: * Bombali District * Falaba District * Koinadugu District * Tonkolili District Category:Provinces of Sierra Leone
title: Northern Province, Sierra Leone
